org.fridlund.pacman.input

Class MenuInputProfile

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fridlund.javalabra.game.input.InputProfile
      • org.fridlund.pacman.input.MenuInputProfile

  • public class MenuInputProfile
extends org.fridlund.javalabra.game.input.InputProfile
    Input Profile used in all the menus. The same instance should be used in all menus through the setMenuItems method.
